title: Strengthening Clinical Practical Competencies: Understanding Chinese Character Structures and Collaboration Through Mobile Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Recognition of basic Chinese character components (radicals) and fundamental computer/smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain over 30 Chinese character components with 90% accuracy
Learners can accurately combine over 20 compound-character (合字性) Chinese characters through collaboration with peers
Learners perform collaborative problem-solving processes with over 80% engagement measured by digital game log analysis
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
